descriptions.title: (Lead) Front End Engineer
duties: Front-End Engineer, Lead, in large Agile projects for Japanese clientele.
Created software for the Japanese Ministry of Defense, Kubota Corporation, JP Post
Worked in ReactJS to connect headless API's in an Agile environment to provide full-stack solutions.
Wireframed concepts in Figma and brought to life with JavaScript, HTML/SCSS.

descriptions.title: Front End Engineer (I)
descriptions.company: Marvel Entertainment, New York, New York
duties: As a member of the Front End Engineer Team for Marvel NYC, developed components for use on Marvel Entertainment production sites with ReactJS, HTML/SCSS, JavaScript.
Mentored with the leading Engineer to learn best practices for full lifecycle web development through Jira and GitHub.

descriptions.title: Applications Developer (I)
descriptions.company: IBM, Armonk, New York; Southbury, Connecticut
duties: Worked in an Agile team for the IBM CIO to create web applications with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, D3.
Engineered data for website usage using Python, Jupyter Notebook.

descriptions.title: Midori Gal
duties: Independent full stack development of nature archive built in Gatsby, GraphQL, ReactJS, Wordpress with instance hosting on Digital Ocean and Netlify.

descriptions.title: Kawaguchi Farmer's Market
duties: Stall hand and event coordination support for local farmer's market in Kawaguchi, Saitama.

descriptions.title: Nature Conservation Society of Japan Osaka Chapter
duties: Farming relief aide word staffhand in multiple farms across the Osaka region of Japan.

descriptions.title: Seinousha Saitama
duties: Farming relief aide for community farm in Kazo, Saitama. Helped elderly workers with field maintenance, summer fruit harvesting, etc.

descriptions.title: Three Jewels
duties: Pro-bono Squarespace development support for non-profit wellness studio in New York City.
